Prompt: How can I search for pet-friendly places on Petofy based on my location?
Response:
To Search for pet-friendly places on Petofy, Please visit https://petofy.com/Home/ or use our mobile app. Now follow these steps:
 - Go to Pet Friendly Places under Find services.
 - Select your city from the list.
 - Select the Pet Friendly Restaurant. Make sure you are logged into your Petofy account.
